data.actual_result: All new messages appear to be above the re-sent message.
data.expected_result: All new messages should be below the re-sent message.
data.short_description: When typing a message after re-sending a failed message, all new messages afterwards are placed above it on the person who re-sent it's client.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a message fail to send - Re-Send the message - Type new messages.
